name: The Rising Martial Arts Genius
summary: I learned martial arts, and everything changed.Seven years had passed since I was thrown into a world where the Murim exists.Jang Woo-hyun finally learned the martial arts he had dreamed of.That was when he realized he possessed an incredible talent.A talent so overwhelming that even the word “genius” couldn’t fully capture it.This limitless talent would eventually lead Jang Woo-hyun beyond the boundaries of humanity and guide him to another world.
author: Marctempest
